conclusion: The task is to predict which container (D or E) the liquid will flow into after passing through baffles.
The liquid starts at point A, flows through baffles B and C, and then passes through baffles D and E.
The liquid flows from point A through baffles B and C.
The liquid will flow out from point B and C.
The liquid then passes through baffles D and E.
The liquid will flow out from point D and E.
After passing through the baffles, the liquid will flow out from point D and E.
The liquid will flow into container D.
